| History                 = The Lozaros Family were a crime family that would sell their grandmother's eyeballs, if there was a 20 percent profit in doing so. It was based in Staten Island and they were getting into business with [[Viktor Aleksandr Vikady (Earth-616)|Vikady]] to help him bring heroin from the Golden Crescent. They would connect him with those who were involved in the heroin retail trade in exchange for a cut. As they weren't directly involved in drugs but they collected tribute from the drug dealers. THe [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]] and [[Dima Alekov Kaganitzky (Earth-616)|Dragunov]] crashed their meeting with Vikady. He got away but the Lozaros in the room were slaughtered.{{r|Punisher: War Zone Vol 1 32}}
